params.name: guild_id
params.description: the guild id this webhook is for, if any

params.name: channel_id
params.description: the channel id this webhook is for, if any

params.name: user
params.description: the user this webhook was created by (not returned when getting a webhook with its token)

params.name: name
params.description: the default name of the webhook

params.name: avatar
params.description: the default user avatar [hash](#DOCS_REFERENCE/image-formatting) of the webhook

params.name: token
params.description: the secure token of the webhook (returned for Incoming Webhooks)

params.name: application_id
params.description: the bot/OAuth2 application that created this webhook

params.name: source_guild
params.description: the guild of the channel that this webhook is following (returned for Channel Follower Webhooks)

params.name: source_channel
params.description: the channel that this webhook is following (returned for Channel Follower Webhooks)

params.name: url
params.description: the url used for executing the webhook (returned by the [webhooks](#DOCS_TOPICS_OAUTH2/webhooks) OAuth2 flow)
